name: Trials And Revelations
description:
Silver must journey into Mystiq Peak and face the queen within if he wants to save those he cares for !!

Trials And Revelations is a prototype for a game I have just begun work on. I recently got into video game making and I am learning the basics. This demo was completed by me in a day. It contains a single stage with a small story, some basic combat and rpg mechanics. 

Please do try it out and give me your feedback.

I would like to thank Jesse Lagrue for teaching me to use a game engine and also for the many tips and tricks to making a believable world. This is for you bro. 

Thank you for playing my game. Cheers, hope all of you like it ^_^
